library.description: Empower your website frontends with layouts, meta-data, pre-processors (markdown, jade, coffeescript, etc.), partials, skeletons, file watching, querying, and an amazing plugin system. DocPad will streamline your web development process allowing you to craft full-featured websites quicker than ever before.
library.name: DocPad

library.description:
A fast, simple & powerful blog framework, powered by Node.js.


Incredibly fast - generate static files in a glance
Markdown support
Deploy to GitHub Pages & Heroku with only one command
Ported Octopress plugins
High extendibility & customizability
Compatible with Windows, Mac & Linux
library.name: hexo

library.description: An amazing little web server with a zero-configuration asset pipeline. Throw your framework away. Supports Less, Stylus, CoffeeScript, Jade, Markdown, and EJS. Supports Metadata and the beloved Partial/Layout paradigm.
library.name: Harp

library.description: Wintersmith is a flexible static site generator. It contains a basic plugin model and doesn't enforce you to use some specific way to construct your site. It supports Markdown. Templating-wise Jade (bundled) and Swig (plugin) are available.
library.name: Wintersmith

library.description: Wheat is a blogging engine that reads a git repo full of markdown articles and presents them as a website.
library.name: wheat

library.description: Punch is a simple, intuitive web publishing framework that will delight both designers and developers.
library.name: punch

library.description: Poet has your code-blogging back. Renders markdown, jade, or any templated files as posts, tag it up with metadata that's passed into any view engine you want, instant pagination, tag and category views, and home in time for dinner.
library.name: Poet

library.description: A generic static site generator built using flatiron, plates, and marked.
library.name: blacksmith

library.description: jQuery Mobile Boilerplate is meant to be a one stop shop for creating a new jQuery Mobile project
library.name: jQuery Mobile Boilerplate

library.description: A simple and flexible static site generator for node.js.
library.name: petrify

library.description:
gistblog is a simple node.js app (easily hosted on Heroku) that uses Github for user authentication and Gists for the backing store of post data. gistblog presents a simple interface to quickly compose markdown-based posts and display them to readers.

The author may publish posts as public, private, or limit viewing of posts to specific Github usernames (useful for a private post among a group of people or peer reviews of drafts before making a post public).
library.name: gistblog

library.description: A really classy, dead simple, markdown based, blogging framework for node.js
library.name: scotch

library.description: Simple and extensible static site generator powered by Grunt.
library.name: Cabin

library.description:
Romulus is a static site generator (like jekyll) featuring:


a clear folder convention
ejs template processing
generating css from less files
github flavored markdown
a local development server behaving like github pages
deploying to github pages
library.name: romulus

library.description: Kerouac is a static site generator written in Node.js. It is the simplest possible tool for transforming content written using lightweight markup, such as Markdown, into a complete website.
library.name: Kerouac

library.description: Jekyll-like static site generator for node.js that aims to be as compatible as possible with mojombo/jekyll. The core is identical to jekyll. In addition is has a set of its own improvements.
library.name: Enfield

library.description: pagen.js is a simple and customizable site generator for node.js. You can generate nice-looking websites, from static to a MongoDB-run blog, in an instant.
library.name: pagen

library.description: Nog is a node powered log (aka blog). Think of it as wheat2, but with slightly different goals and a little more mature.
library.name: Nog

library.description: A node.js-based application to generate static web sites with HTML or Markdown and JSON/YAML data.
library.name: yassg

library.description: AutoBlog is a little JavaScript utility to build static blogs with minimum server support.
library.name: AutoBlog

library.description:
Python build script for HTML 5 sites.

Compiles and minifies JS from script tags
Generates CSS from LESS files
Cleans and compiles CSS
Lossless image optimization of jpgs, pngs, gifs
library.name: Build-o-Matic

library.description: AkashaCMS is a content management system, and static site generator, written in Node.js.  It's designed to produce HTML5+CSS3 sites using the latest technologies, and latest microformat metadata techniques, while producing speedy low-cost-to-host static HTML websites.
library.name: Akashacms

library.description: It has never been easier to leverage the full force of powerful frameworks like Bootstrap and Zurb Foundation. Nothing can stop you now.
library.name: Assemble
